oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Declaration of Intention to Become a Naturalized Citizen
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charles M. Morris appeared before the Circuit Court Clerk to declare his intention to become a citizen of the Confederate States of America and to renounce forever all allegiance to Abraham Lincoln, President of the United States of America.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Morris, Charles Marshall
Davidson County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
